channel.title: Posts on Terminal
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Terminal

item.title: Productivity
item.description: Reactive resume : Reactive Resume is a free and open source resume builder that’s built to make the mundane tasks of creating, updating and sharing your resume easy. Sejda : Easy, pleasant and productive PDF editor. Kanboard : Kanboard is a free and open source Kanban project management software. Rise up pad : This is an etherpad service hosted by Riseup. highly customizable open source online editor providing collaborative editing in really real-time.
item.content:
Reactive resume : Reactive Resume is a free and open source resume builder that’s built to make the mundane tasks of creating, updating and sharing your resume easy.
Sejda : Easy, pleasant and productive PDF editor.
Kanboard : Kanboard is a free and open source Kanban project management software.
Rise up pad : This is an etherpad service hosted by Riseup. highly customizable open source online editor providing collaborative editing in really real-time.
Taiga : The free and open-source project management tool. For cross-functional agile teams to work effectively
Bitwarden : A free and open source password management tool. Can generate unlimited passwords and can be used in unlimited devices \

item.title: Resources
item.description: Sci Hub: The goal of Sci-Hub is to provide free and unrestricted access to all scientific knowledge.
item.content: Sci Hub: The goal of Sci-Hub is to provide free and unrestricted access to all scientific knowledge.
